name: The Duo (GameDevShailoh)
description:
the duo is a platformer game where you and a freind control each a character(or do it solo for  challenge) collect coins and avoid the pitfalls!

this is my second game jam and i suffered from a sprained ankle during the jam

witch woud explain why some of the game may feel rushed.

feedback appreiciated!

ps: the webgl may not work so i included the download.

The CONTROLS:

WASD for blue player.

Arrow keys for pink character.

music credits: zapsplat.com
